evidence.text: REZVAN: Mom, please don't ruin my night, Sadaf is coming back from her town. In fact, she is coming earlier because of tonight's plan. I asked her to come earlier, how does it look like if I don’t show up myself?
NAJMEH: My darling, this is an exceptional night, you and your friends can go to the cafe another day.
REZVAN: Mom, you're killing us! Just tell us what it is!

REZVAN: Yes, Mom.
NAJMEH: My darling, did your friend eat her food?
REZVAN: Mom, this is still too thick, make it thinner.
REZVAN: Mom! She says natural eyebrows are fashionable.

REZVAN: Ma, Sadaf is my only friend.
REZVAN: Mom, I don't understand. What do you exactly mean by Dad's job conditions? What conditions does it have?
REZVAN: Mom, Sadaf’s dormitory is on our way! Also, you said she shouldn't come to our home. I'm 21 years old and you’re controlling all my relationships.
REZVAN: Mom… Najmeh looks at Rezvan.
REZVAN: Mom, don’t you understand what I'm saying, I was with her, she didn't do anything.
REZVAN: Mom, what are you talking about? I was speaking to my classmate.

REZVAN: what's wrong, Mom?
NAJMEH: My darling, your dad's gun is missing. do you know where it is?
REZVAN: A gun? Does Dad have a gun?
REZVAN: what happened Mom? Until a few days ago, it was no one's fault that thousands of people had strokes every day. A stroke was just a stroke. Now today if Dad has a stroke, it is our fault?
REZVAN: Mom, I understand that you had a rough childhood, but that is no reason to think that everything Dad says is true. Why would Sana and I take Dad's gun?
REZVAN: I do not know. How do we know that you didn't get it yourself, Mom?
REZVAN: Mom, how can we be sure you didn’t do it?

REZVAN: We were involved in this from the beginning. Get up Mom, stand up.
REZVAN: I have the gun. it's right here. I will call Uncle to come and take Mom and Sana, when they leave, I will give you the gun.
REZVAN: Don't you want your gun? I have it with me, in this orchard. Let Mom and Sana go, I will give you the gun.
